column2: b'Taka no Tsume Yoshida-kun Batten File: Natsuyasumi Mystery Adventure'

b'A mini side-story "Summer Mystery Adventure" series to the Taka no Tsume 8: Yoshida-kun no Batten File film. Though the film was released three years ago, it has a manga counterpart that\'s still running in CoroCoro Comic whose 2nd tankoubon volume was released recently. As well as scifi supernatural stories being very popular in Japan during the summer season.'
[b'Taka no Tsume 8: Yoshida-kun no Batten File']
